atlantic.title: Kanye Should Have Taken the Mic From Beck at the Grammys
atlantic.topComment: First of all, where do West or Kornhaber get off implying that Beck isn't a serious artist? This isn't Milli Vanilli you're talking about here, this is an incredibly talented artist who's done more to enrich music as a whole than Beyonce has. Whether...

atlantic.title: Sleepy, Stressed, or Sick?
atlantic.topComment: Why is there a photo of someone who suffers from HYPER- thyroidism in an article about HYPO-thyroidism? These are two different birds.

atlantic.title: Alabama's 'Dramatic Defiance' on Gay Marriage
